import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; import SearchForm from "./SearchForm.js"; import Loading from "./" import "./index.css"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { faSpinner, faCircleNotch } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons'; import '@fortawesome/fontawesome-free/js/all'; const Results = (props) => { const [data, setData] = useState([]); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true); const params = useParams(); useEffect(() => { fetchData().catch( (error) => { console.log(error); }) }, [params.query]); useEffect(() => { if (!isLoading){ //remove the loading screen } }, [isLoading]); const fetchData = async () => { const results = await fetch("https://api.github.com/search/repositories?q=" + params.query); const data = await results.json(); setData(data); setIsLoading(false); }; function SearchResults(props) { if (props.totalCount !== undefined) { return (

Search found {props.totalCount} results

    { data.items.map( item => { return (
  • Repository: {item.name}
    Owner: {item.owner.login}
    Description: {item.description}
    • ); }) }
); } return null; } return (
{/* */}
); } export default Results;
